resources.string: Open Dropbox Buildbot folder (maybe with errors)
If you\'re waiting longer than 10 seconds, please check your network connection!
Download new version (delete old version first!)

Of cause it\'\s not required to enter your username. But if you have got any \'\special needs\'\ e.g. the possibility to order special notifications you will have to fill in the gap. Otherwise I won\'\t have the possibility to identify your device and you won\'\t be able to use this services. Entering your username later is not possible but I can remove it for you if you wish. Of cause I won\'\t give your data to others. You will find more information on the HTC Desire HD CyanogenMod 10.1 thread on Android-Hilfe.de (german forum).
Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
Device is already registered on server.
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on UpdateChecker Server.
From UpdateChecker Server: successfully added device!
From UpdateChecker Server: successfully removed device!
Could not register device on Demo Server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).
